suggestionid.description: unique identifier assigned automatically by Koha

suggestedby.description: borrowernumber for the perpson making the suggestion, foreign key linking to the borrowers table

managedby.description: borrowernumber for the librarian managing the suggestion, foreign key linking to the borrowers table

acceptedby.description: borrowernumber for the librarian who accepted the suggestion, foreign key linking to the borrowers table

accepteddate.description: date the suggestion was marked as accepted

rejectedby.description: borrowernumber for the librarian who rejected the suggestion, foreign key linking to the borrowers table

rejecteddate.description: date the suggestion was marked as rejected

STATUS.description: suggestion status (ASKED, CHECKED, ACCEPTED, or REJECTED)

copyrightdate.description: copyright date of the suggested item

place.description: publication place of the suggested item

biblionumber.description: foreign key linking the suggestion to the biblio table after the suggestion has been ordered

reason.description: reason for accepting or rejecting the suggestion

budgetid.description: foreign key linking the suggested budget to the aqbudgets table

branchcode.description: foreign key linking the suggested branch to the branches table

collectiontitle.description: collection name for the suggested item

currency.description: suggested currency for the suggested price

total.description: suggested total cost (price*quantity updated for currency)
